section.p: This template represents problems or diagnoses present at the time of discharge which occurred during the hospitalization or need to be monitored after hospitalization. This section includes an optional entry to record patient conditions.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-7979, CONF:1198-10394, CONF:1198-15355 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.24"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Hospital Discharge Diagnosis Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.24)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15355)/@code="11535-2" Hospital Discharge Diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15356, CONF:1198-30861)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7983, CONF:1198-15489)
Conforms to Hospital Discharge Diagnosis2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.33:2015-08-01)
SHALL conform to Hospital Discharge Diagnosis Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.24)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15355)/@code="11535-2" Hospital Discharge Diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15356, CONF:1198-30861)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:7981, R2.1=CONF:1198-7981)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7982, R2.1=CONF:1198-7982)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7983, CONF:1198-15489)
Conforms to Hospital Discharge Diagnosis2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.33:2015-08-01)

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7979, CONF:10394 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.24"
Consol Hospital Discharge Diagnosis Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15355)/@code="11535-2" Hospital Discharge Diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15356)
Consol Hospital Discharge Diagnosis Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:7981, R2.1=CONF:1198-7981)
Consol Hospital Discharge Diagnosis Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7982, R2.1=CONF:1198-7982)

Consol Hospital Discharge Diagnosis Section If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:7984) Conforms to Hospital Discharge Diagnosis (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.33)
